name: rest (itch) (leiyue)
description:
rest.

A short interactive novel about rain, storms, pain, and long journeys.

Written and illustrated by leiyue.

Please turn sound on.

And please play on desktop! It will run on mobile but the formatting is all wrong. I would much prefer you have the intended experience.
